s0482: Thirteenth year fourth month day wuwu, Wei ruler became king, Han also became king.
s0483: Sent Zhang Yi to attack and take Xia, moved its people to Wei.
s0484: Fourteenth year, changed to first year.
s0485: Second year, Zhang Yi met with Qi and Chu ministers at Ni Sang.
s0486: Third year, Han and Wei crown princes came to court.
s0487: Zhang Yi became prime minister of Wei.
s0488: Fifth year, the king toured to Beihe.
s0489: Seventh year, Yue Chi became prime minister of Qin.
s0490: Han, Zhao, Wei, Yan, Qi led the Xiongnu to attack Qin together.
s0491: Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to battle at Xiuyu, captured their general Shen Chai, defeated Zhao prince Ke and Han crown prince Huan, beheaded 82,000.
s0492: Eighth year, Zhang Yi again became prime minister of Qin.
s0493: Ninth year, attacked Wei, took Puyang.
s0494: Tenth year, Zhang Yi attacked Wei, took He Dong.
s0495: Eleventh year, attacked Wei, took Yao and Xingyuan.
s0496: Twelfth year, attacked Wei, took Zhaoge.
s0497: Thirteenth year, attacked Wei, took Hequ.
s0498: Fourteenth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi.
s0499: Fifteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang.
s0500: Sixteenth year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.
s0501: Seventeenth year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu.
s0502: Eighteenth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi.
s0503: Nineteenth year, attacked Wei, took Linjin.
s0504: Twentieth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu.
s0505: Twenty-first year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.
s0506: Twenty-second year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.
s0507: Twenty-third year, attacked Wei, took Linjin again.
s0508: Twenty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu again.
s0509: Twenty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi again.
s0510: Twenty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.
s0511: Twenty-seventh year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.
s0512: Twenty-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Zhaoge again.
s0513: Twenty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Xingyuan again.
s0514: Thirtieth year, attacked Wei, took Yao again.
s0515: Thirty-first year, attacked Wei, took He Dong again.
s0516: Thirty-second year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.
s0517: Thirty-third year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.
s0518: Thirty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.
s0519: Thirty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0520: Thirty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.
s0521: Thirty-seventh year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.
s0522: Thirty-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi again.
s0523: Thirty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Linjin again.
s0524: Fortieth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu again.
s0525: Forty-first year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.
s0526: Forty-second year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.
s0527: Forty-third year, attacked Wei, took Linjin again.
s0528: Forty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu again.
s0529: Forty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi again.
s0530: Forty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.
s0531: Forty-seventh year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.
s0532: Forty-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Zhaoge again.
s0533: Forty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Xingyuan again.
s0534: Fiftieth year, attacked Wei, took Yao again.
s0535: Fifty-first year, Duke Zhaoxiang died, his son King Xiaowen ascended.
s0536: King Xiaowen of Qin first year, attacked Wei, took He Dong again.
s0537: Second year, King Xiaowen died, his son King Zhuangxiang ascended.
s0538: King Zhuangxiang of Qin first year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.
s0539: Second year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.
s0540: Third year, King Zhuangxiang died, his son Qin Shi Huang ascended.
